config.localization.languageOverride.des: Language override for the extension UI (requires reloading the view). This does not apply to the settings page and context menu.
config.autoCollapseOnOpen.description: Automatically collapse 'NestedScenarios' ('ВложенныеСценарии') and 'ScenarioParameters' ('ПараметрыСценария') sections when opening a file.
config.stepsExternalUrl.description: URL to download steps.htm with Gherkin step definitions. Leave empty to use the file from the extension.
config.autoFillNestedScenariosOnSave.des: Automatically fill 'NestedScenarios' section with missing scenarios when saving YAML files.
Automatically fill 'ScenarioParameters' section with missing parameters when saving YAML files.
config.autoReplaceTabsWithSpacesOnSave.d: Automatically replace tabs with 4 spaces when saving YAML files.
config.autoAlignNestedScenarioParameters: Automatically align nested scenario call parameters by '=' on save.
config.autoAlignGherkinTablesOnSave.desc: Automatically align Gherkin table columns when saving YAML files.
config.scenarioParameterExclusions.descr: Exclusions for scenario parameter recognition (values in square brackets that should not be added to ScenarioParameters).
config.showRefillMessages.description: Show notification messages when sections are automatically refilled on save.
config.checkRelatedParentScenarios.descr: Automatically validate related parent scenarios when opening/saving a scenario file.
